laboratory_examinations.findings: Volume of 5860 mL, contained 70.3 g glucose, creatinine clearance of 67 mL/min.
Total bilirubin of 60 mg/dL, alkaline phosphatase activity of 342 IU/L, aspartate aminotransferase activity of 54 IU/L, and gamma-glutamyl transpeptidase activity of 213 IU/L.
Hypochromic microcytic anemia with a hematocrit of 33.7% and a red blood cell count of 3,420,000 cells/mm3. White blood cell count was 3400 cells/mm3.
Blood urea nitrogen level was 12.9 mg/dL.
Inflammatory cell infiltrate with organisms appearing as broad, nonseptate hyphae.
Significant reduction in opacity at the same level.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Revealed a significant reduction in opacity over 6 months.
